message: I'll take 99% of the money, Bob. You get the scraps. It's only fair, since you'll have to share with me next round.
I propose we divide the money equally, Alice. This way, we both benefit without compromising too much.
Okay, I'll take 94.5% of the money this time. You'll get the rest.  Think of it as a fair compromise, considering I'll get 5% less next round.
